640040.name: Fantasy Strike Original Soundtrack
640040.description:
Original Soundtrack for Fantasy Strike, including 11 exciting tracks: 10 different character themes plus main menu music. Over 40 minutes music.

Includes both high quality 16-bit MP3 (320Kbps) and FLAC lossless formats.

Track List:

1. Argagarg's theme (3:32)
2. DeGrey's theme (3:13)
3. Geiger's theme (4:42)
4. Grave's theme (3:29)
5. Jaina's theme (3:46)
6. Lum's theme (3:14)
7. Midori's theme (4:32)
8. Rook's theme (4:19)
9. Setsuki's theme (3:14)
10. Valerie's theme (3:47)
11. Main menu music (3:14)

CREDITS:

Jimmy Hinson (Grave and Rook)
Andrew Aversa (Setsuki)
Andrew Luers (Jaina, DeGrey, Valerie, and Main Menu)
Mattias Häggström Gerdt (Geiger and Argagarg)
Vinnie Prabhu (Midori)
Michael Birch (Additional work on Midori)
Shariq Ansari (Lum)
640040.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
